items.sentence: There\'s something strange about Tom today.
There\'s something that I want to tell you.
This is the best book that I\'ve ever read.
Sorry, I didn\'t quite catch what you said.
The heavy rain prevented me from going out.
The heavy rain prevented us from going out.
The house we used to live in was torn down.
I remember the day you were born very well.
I saw you driving by my house this morning.
Tom left a message on my answering machine.
Tom left behind a widow and three children.
Tom left everything to his three grandsons.
Tom left the house shortly after Mary left.
Tom left the office immediately after work.
Tom left to go fishing shortly before dawn.
I take it you\'ve never seen Tom kiss Mary.
I think I heard Tom say that he\'d do that.
Tom got angry when he read Mary\'s message.
Would you tell Tom why you didn\'t do that?
Wouldn\'t it be suspicious if Tom did that?
Tom and his family survived the earthquake.
Tom arrived a day earlier than we expected.
Tom asked Mary a lot of personal questions.
He didn\'t come back to the base yesterday.
He doesn\'t know what to do with his money.
Every even number is the sum of two primes.
Everybody except us knew what was going on.
When was the last time you had an accident?
When was the last time you left work early?
When was the last time you took the subway?
When was the last time you watched a movie?
Where are you going for Christmas vacation?
Where are you going the day after tomorrow?
I didn\'t think that anyone would like Tom.
I don\'t think Tom will do that by himself.
I find this whole discussion really stupid.
I forgot that Tom knows how to read French.
I had a lot of fun working on this project.
I studied French when I was in high school.
Don\'t do too many things at the same time.
Don\'t ever let me hear you say that again.
Don\'t forget to bring the camera with you.
Don\'t forget to extinguish your cigarette.
Don\'t forget to tell Tom to do that today.
Tom says you may not need to come tomorrow.
Tom seemed to be in a big hurry to do that.
Tom seemed to believe everything Mary said.
Tom seems to be acting a tad foolish today.
Is there anything special I can do for you?
Is there anything we should be looking for?
